application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
description: Erection of a single storey rear extension and enlargement of existing basement includuing three side and one front lightwells
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall begin not later than three years from the date of this decision.
Condition : 2 - The basement hereby permitted shall at no time be used or occupied as a separate dwelling independent of the main house and shall not be used as sleeping accommodation

Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building, unless otherwise shown on the approved plans.
Condition : 5 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and specifications: [insert plan numbers/documents].
